articles.title: Message of Sympathy to President of DR Congo
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to President of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of sympathy to Joseph Kabila Kabange, president of DR Congo, as regards the recent killing of many innocent civilians by an armed terrorists in North Kivu Province of DR Congo.
					 Reiterating the DPRK's consistent stand of opposing all forms of terrorism, the message extended support and solidarity to the efforts of the president and government of friendly DR Congo to eradicate the tragic consequences of terrorism and achieve peace and security of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Indonesian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Indonesian President
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Joko Widodo, president of Indonesia, on the 71st anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished the president and people of Indonesia bigger successes in their work for the development and prosperity of the country, expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Greetings to Indonesian FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Indonesian FM
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Retno Lestari Priansari Marsudi, foreign minister of Indonesia, on the 71st anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries with a long history and tradition would grow stronger in the common interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets VIPs of DR Congo
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets VIPs of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) who visited DR Congo as head of a WPK delegation, separately met and had talks with Jean-Pierre Kambila Kankwende, vice-director of the Secretariat of Presidency for Political Affairs, Aubin Minaku Ndjalandjoko, speaker of the Lower House, Antoine Gizenga, general secretary of the PALU, Lambert Mende Omalanga, minister of Communication, and Willy Makiashi, vice prime minister and minister of Job and Labor.
					 Jean-Pierre Kambila Kankwende said all the successes made by the DPRK under the leadership of HE Kim Jong Un clearly proved the importance of the ideological work, expressing the will to positively learn from the experience of the WPK.
					
					 Aubin Minaku Ndjalandjoko expressed belief that the WPK and the Korean people would foil the escalating moves of the imperialists to isolate and stifle the DPRK and always win victories under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Antoine Gizenga and Lambert Mende Omalanga said they are greatly encouraged by the DPRK dynamically advancing despite the U.S. moves, adding that the WPK enjoys high international prestige and the DPRK is a powerful country advancing with strong mental power. They extended support and solidarity to the just cause of the WPK and the Korean people under the outstanding leadership of HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Willy Makiashi said he was greatly admired by the guidance of the WPK achieving big successes in the economic construction and the efforts for improving people's living standard despite all difficulties and hardships.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Egyptian Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Egyptian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Wednesday met Iman Mostafa Abdou Ahmed, Egyptian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him.
					 Ri Yong Ho highly praised the Egyptian ambassador for doing a lot of things for development of the relations between the two countries during his stay.
					
					 Referring to the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the development of the relations with Egypt, Ri Yong Ho stressed the importance to boost the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries despite change of situation.
					
					 The Egyptian ambassador said he was pleased over his contribution to the development of the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries during his office. He expressed the belief that the friendly Korean people will achieve bigger successes in the drive for prosperity and progress of the country under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He expressed deep thanks for the DPRK's unsparing support to Egypt during the Mideast War in 1973 and its consistent solidarity to the just cause of the people of Arab countries including Palestine.

articles.title: Greetings to Seventh Congress of Angolan People's Liberation Movement
articles.content:
Greetings to Seventh Congress of Angolan People's Liberation Movement
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to the Seventh Congress of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola.
					 The message said that over four decades since the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola achieved the independence of the country through protracted armed struggle, it has led the Angolan government and people to make great successes in the work for the national reconciliation and unity, the country's stability and socio-economic development.
					
					 It expressed belief that the Seventh Congress of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola will be an important occasion in defending the gains achieved by the Angolan people at the cost of blood, consolidating the successes made in the struggle for the country's independent development and prosperity and further strengthening the movement under the leadership of President Jose Eduardo Dos Santos.
					
					 Believing that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the WPK and the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola would grow stronger in the interests of the peoples of the two countries, it sincerely wished the Seventh Congress of the movement big successes in its work.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Denounces U.S. Nuclear Arms Buildup
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Denounces U.S. Nuclear Arms Buildup
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK issued a statement on Wednesday in connection with the fact that the situation on the Korean peninsula has entered a very grave phase due to the U.S. ceaseless nuclear arms buildup targeting the DPRK.
					 The statement said that the U.S. brought to the Anderson air force base on Guam, on which B-52H strategic bombers are already deployed, several B-1Bs on August 6 and three B-2As on August 9, the first of their kinds in ten years, according to a report. It went on:
					
					 The introduction of the nuclear strategic bombers to Guam by the U.S. in the wake of its official decision on the deployment of THAAD in south Korea after bringing into the Korean peninsula and its vicinity strategic assets including nuclear-powered carrier and nuclear submarines proves that the U.S. plan for a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK has entered a reckless phase of implementation.
					
					 Such military moves of the U.S. are part of its sinister strategy to contain Russia and China in the Asia-Pacific and maintain its military hegemony in the region, not just aiming at a surprise preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK.
					
					 It is the fixed stand of the DPRK to fundamentally remove the danger of a nuclear war imposed by the U.S. by dint of a powerful nuclear deterrence and safeguard the peace and security in the region and the world.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never remain an on-looker to the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail getting ever-more pronounced with each passing day, but will whet more sharply the treasured sword of nuclear weapons of justice for defending the sovereignty and security of the country.
					
					 If the U.S. goes reckless, misjudging the trend of the times and the strategic position of the DPRK, all the U.S. military bases in the operational theatre in the Pacific including Guam will face ruin in the face of all-out and substantial attack to be mounted by the army of the DPRK.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group's Military Nexus with Japan Assailed
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group's Military Nexus with Japan Assailed
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea issued a statement Wednesday denouncing the Park Geun Hye group for tightening military nexus with the Japanese reactionaries.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The puppet group of traitors has held frequent sordid confabs with Japan defence minister and heads of "Self-Defense Forces" in south Korea from last year under the pretence of discussing ways of "promoting military exchange and friendship". At the "2016 Asia security meeting" in June last and on several other occasions the group agreed in secrecy with Japan to expand to a large extent military "exchange" and "cooperation" including the conclusion of "the agreement on protecting military information", reinforced laying of hotline between defence authorities, visits to military drills and mutual visits of airplanes and warships.
					
					 Accordingly, the puppet group allows Japan "Self-Defense Forces" enter south Korean ports while fluttering the "flag of rising sun shedding rays," denounced as a "symbol of Japanese imperialism" and the "flag of a war criminal state", and even holds joint military drills with Japan under the pretext of countering the "north's nuclear and missile threats". It even resumed the puppet naval drilling flotilla's entry into Japanese port which had been suspended for five years in the face of strong protest at home and abroad and is revealing its attempt to hand over to Japan "information concerning north's missiles" with the deployment of THAAD in south Korea as an occasion.
					
					 Still remaining un-vented in the minds of the Koreans are wrath and grudge against the Japanese imperialist aggressors who drenched 3 000-ri land with blood shed by Koreans through barbarous manslaughter they committed after putting Korea under their control for nearly half a century.
					
					 However, in July the puppet group allowed the Japanese reactionaries to openly hold an event for marking the foundation anniversary of "Self-Defense Forces", the descendants of the Japanese imperialist aggressor forces, in downtown Seoul, and senseless guys of the puppet authorities took part in it. This servile act is an intolerable insult and mockery of all the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The Park group's military nexus with Japan is an intolerable act of sycophancy and treachery and a heinous anti-national crime aimed to pave the way for staging a comeback to the Korean peninsula to the Japanese who imposed the long-pent up grudge on the Korean nation and inflict the disaster of war on this land again.
					
					 It is clear that the military nexus and conspiracy between the Park group and the Japanese reactionaries being pushed forward at the instigation of the U.S. will lead to triangular military alliance with the U.S. and Japan in the end and thus bring the crisis of war to the Korean peninsula and seriously threaten peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 The Park group's military nexus with the Japanese reactionaries aimed to dare stand against the DPRK is a suicidal act of digging up its own grave.
					
					 All the Koreans have to turn out in the nationwide struggle to throw overboard the Park group of traitors, trouble-maker of the nation, as soon as possible, foil the Japanese reactionaries' moves for reinvasion and defend the peace and security of the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Seminar on Juche-oriented Idea of Literature and Arts Held
articles.content:
Seminar on Juche-oriented Idea of Literature and Arts Held
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the Juche-oriented idea of literature and arts was held at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Wednesday marking the 80th anniversary of the premiere of drama "The Sea of Blood" in Manjiang organized and led by President Kim Il Sung in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle. 
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture, officials, creators, artistes, reporters and editors in the fields of literature and arts and media and teachers, researchers and students of science and education institutions. 
					
					 An Tong Chun, chairman of the C.C., the General Federation of Unions of Art and Literature of Korea, said in a report that the performance of drama "The Sea of Blood" personally organized and guided by the President in  Manjiang, Fusong County in August, Juche 25 (1936) was a historic event that proved the big role of the literature and arts in the revolutionary struggle and provided a meaningful landmark in developing and enriching the tradition of the Party's revolutionary literature and arts.
					
					 The tradition of the revolutionary literature and arts established by the President and his feats were preserved and glorified as the renaissance of the 20th century under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il, he noted, adding:
					
					 The proud tradition of the anti-Japanese revolutionary literature and arts founded and glorified by the great leaders is being carried forward and developed by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Speeches were made.
					
					 The speakers explained that the immortal classic "The Sea of Blood" is a monumental masterpiece which fully met the basic requirements of the revolutionary literature and arts raised by the Juche-oriented idea of literature and arts in terms of philosophy and profundity of ideological contents and width and depth of depiction of life.
					
					 They called upon all officials, creators and artistes to defend the leader and revolution through the mass production of masterpieces and follow the tradition of the struggle waged by artistes of the former generation who served as advancing group and bugler of the Party, true to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: National Sports Contest of Workers Opens
articles.content:
National Sports Contest of Workers Opens
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- A national sports contest of workers opened with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street on Wednesday in the run-up to the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 In the contest, which will run through August 26 in various gymnasiums here, the participants will compete in football, shooting, Taekwon-Do and hurdle-overcoming race.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were officials concerned, officials of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK), citizens, players and coaches selected in provinces.
					
					 Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the GFTUK, made an opening address.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, there were Taekwon-do team pattern competitions.

articles.title: National Children's Paduk Contest Held
articles.content:
National Children's Paduk Contest Held
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The 5th National Children's Paduk Contest was held in the Holy Taekwon-Do Hall from August 10 to 17.
					 It brought together more than 200 children selected from across the country. It was divided into Group A (first and second year classes of primary schools) and Group B (up to high classes of kindergartens). They competed in boys and girls individual and team events.
					
					 Children in South Hwanghae Province came first in the boys team event of Group A and those in South Phyongan Province in the girls team event of Group A.
					
					 Children in Pyongyang City placed first in boys and girls team events and mixed doubles events of Group B respectively.

articles.title: Folk Dance "Tondollari"
articles.content:
Folk Dance "Tondollari"
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The Korean people have created a number of folk dances like peasant dance and dance with fans from long ago. 
					 One of them is "Tondollari" which has been popular in the east coastal area. Visitors to the area can see local people enjoy the dance on holidays.
					
					 It resembles folk dances of Koguryo Kingdom (B.C. 277-A.D. 668) in rhythmic movements characterized by passionate swinging of arms and harmonious striding.
					
					 The word "Tondollari" is inflected from "the dawn will break".
					
					 The folk dance "Tondollari" was recreated by the National Folk Art Troupe and other art troupes of the DPRK to infuse national emotion and optimism into the Korean people.

articles.title: Songchon Hot Spring in DPRK
articles.content:
Songchon Hot Spring in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The DPRK is abundant in hot spring and mineral water resources good for human health and treatment of diseases.
					 Among them is the Songchon Hot Spring in Onjong-ri, Songchon County, South Phyongan Province, which has been well-known from 600 years ago.
					
					 It is recorded in the book "Tonggukyojisungnam (Korean geography)" published in 1481 that "a hot spring is at the foot of Mt. Yaksu."
					
					 The spring is an alkaline one considered to be efficacious for arteriosclerosis, arthropathy, neuralgia, operation aftereffect, hypertension and skin diseases.
					
					 According to Kim Jong Sul, director of the Songchon Onjong Sanatorium, many patients have taken hot spring cure and 90 percent of them got better.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands Park Geun Hye Group as Modern-day "Five Traitors in 1905"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands Park Geun Hye Group as Modern-day "Five Traitors in 1905"
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group's pro-U.S., pro-Japanese acts of stunning the public at home and abroad such as projected deployment of THAAD and racket for nullifying the crimes related to sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army remind the Koreans of the departed soul of the "five traitors in 1905" who sold off the country and nation as dirty stooges of the Japanese imperialists early in the past century. Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 South Korea is now plunged into the whirlwind of acute political, military and diplomatic confrontation among big powers due to the traitors' moves for deploying THAAD despite curse and censure of the public at home and abroad. Consequently, the destiny of the south Korean people is at stake.
					
					 The projected deployment of THAAD is an unpardonable act of treachery as it turns south Korea into a theatre of confrontation among big powers and leaves the fate of the compatriots to the tender mercy of foreign forces.
					
					 Unspeakable are the mental and material damages done by the Japanese imperialists against the Korean nation through their most cruel and barbarous colonial rule in the past.
					
					 But the Park Geun Hye group of traitors is going to conceal such thrice-cursed crimes committed by the descendants of samurais for a petty amount of money paid by Japan.
					
					 The group rubbed salt in the wounds of victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army recently, without an iota of guilty conscience despite the mounting protest of people of all socials standings in south Korea against it. The group cooked up the "reconciliation and recovery foundation" in a bid to get a paltry amount of money from the Japanese reactionaries. 
					
					 That's why the Korean nation is condemning the Park group as the modern-day "five traitors in 1905".
					
					 The Park group have lost the qualifications to live on this land any longer as they can hardly be regarded as part of the Korean nation. What awaits the group is a miserable ruin.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules S. Korean Warmongers' Bluffing
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules S. Korean Warmongers' Bluffing
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Ri Sang Hun, commander of the south Korean puppet marine corps, inspected Paekryong Island and other islands in the hot spot waters of the West Sea recently where he blustered that the "north would provoke in an unpredictable way" and ordered soldiers to "repulse the provocation by courageously pulling triggers in a conditioned response."
					 Earlier, the puppet military group again picked up the doubtful "mine explosion case" in August last year and cried out for "strongly reacting" to it. 
					
					 After staging such funny charade, the puppet forces claimed that the "north would consider it as a very threatening development."
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday ridicules it as a bluffing of the fools going so reckless as to have a skirmish though they are unable to properly move.
					
					 What matters is that the south Korean puppet forces are reeling off such invectives while counting on their U.S. master, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 No matter what bluffing and north-targeted war drum-beats they make, counting on their master, this will get them to nowhere.
					
					 Their military provocation is as foolish an act as putting their heads under the blade of a straw-cutter.
					
					 Now the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army is sharply watching the moves of the enemies, keeping within its sight the Park Geun Hye group of traitors keen to unleash a war against the north at the instigation of foreign forces.
					
					 The puppet forces are bound to be "severely punished" by the Korean People's Army's merciless retaliatory strikes. They had better act with discretion, not beating the air.

articles.title: Leading Newspapers Slam Park for Asking for Sympathy
articles.content:
Leading Newspapers Slam Park for Asking for Sympathy
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, traitor Park Geun Hye termed the just public voices critical of THAAD deployment "weird story and false rumor." Not content with this, she shed crocodile tears, lamenting she "lost her parents" and she was "broken-hearted."
					 DPRK leading newspapers Wednesday in commentaries brand this behavior as a disgusting gesture to tide over the worst crisis by garnering sympathy from the people.
					
					 The support rate for Park is rapidly sinking despite such disgusting gesture. Consequently, there is no prospect for her to get rid of the crisis, Rodong Sinmun says, adding:
					
					 She turned south Korea into a field full of wormwood bushes through her sycophancy and treachery, confrontation with the compatriots in the north, fascist crackdown, corruption and lack of ability and caused chronic political confusion and unending social unrest. Therefore, she is already forsaken and cursed by the people.
					
					 The south Korean people are not taken in by such ridiculous burlesque staged by Park on death bed but fully aware her end is drawing near.
					
					 Now is the time for Park to guess what a high price she has to pay for having worked hard to deploy THAAD to please her U.S. master, utterly indifferent to the fate of the people.
					
					 However hard she may try to get rid of the abyss of ruin, she can never escape the miserable end of descendant of "yusin" dictator and family of quislings without equals.
					
					 Minju Joson says that Park is making her desperate efforts to prolong her remaining days by abusing even the name of her father who was shot to death, but this farce is only touching off curse and disillusionment with her.

articles.title: THAAD Deployment in S. Korea Disturbs Regional Peace and Security: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
THAAD Deployment in S. Korea Disturbs Regional Peace and Security: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Media of China and Russia are strongly blasting THAAD deployment in S. Korea. They comment that the U.S. is planning to deploy THAAD in Japan and the Philippines, too, and THAAD deployment in south Korea is chiefly aimed to disable China's strategic nuclear force. This cannot but upset the regional strategic balance and spark off a new Cold War as it is part of the moves for building the U.S. missile shield and establishing the U.S.-Japan-south Korea triangular military alliance in a bid to contain major big powers in the Asia-Pacific region, they charged, adding China and Russia will never remain a passive onlooker to this for the sake of their security.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary says these comments are based on the objective facts about the U.S. pivot to the Asia-Pacific strategy and the U.S. forces' military moves in the region.
					
					 The U.S. is claiming that THAAD deployment in south Korea will have no impact on the strategic security of China and Russia but it is no more than a clumsy wordplay, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 THAAD deployment in south Korea is a product of the U.S. military strategy to disable the strategic nuclear force of China and Russia and hold hegemony in the region.
					
					 The situation in the Asia-Pacific region is reaching an extreme phase and the world peace is seriously threatened. This is because the U.S. is getting all the more pronounced in its moves to put the Asia-Pacific region under its control and dominate the world. The U.S. is, indeed, chiefly to blame for escalating tensions and disturbing global peace.
					
					 The U.S. should be wholly accountable for escalating tensions.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Park Geun Hye Group's Rhetoric about "Treachery"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Park Geun Hye Group's Rhetoric about "Treachery"
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Park Geun Hye group of south Korea labeled lawmakers from the Minju Party who visited a neighboring country to hold a seminar on deployment THAAD "traitors" and "neo-sycophants," not content with slandering them.
					 Commenting this, Minju Joson Wednesday terms the group's ruckus a ridiculous and absurd rhetoric about "treachery" spouted by top-class pro-U.S. lackeys.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The pro-U.S. one-sided policy pursued by the Park Geun Hye group during its tenure of office was one of treachery which offered the whole south Korean land as a permanent colony of outsiders.
					
					 The Park group's decision on THAAD deployment is facing strong public protest in south Korea and the international community.
					
					 It is clear that if the whole of south Korea turns into the theatre of fierce nuclear stand-off among neighboring big powers, the south Koreans will be thrown into such uneasiness and horror that they might be hit by unidentified nuclear bombs any time.
					
					 It is precisely for this reason that the inhabitants in Songju County and other south Koreans of all social standings are dead-set against the deployment of THAAD as their lives are subject to constant threat because they are driven into abyss of death, being exposed to the danger of losing their land overnight, land where they did farming generation after generation.
					
					 This is throwing those obsessed with confrontation with the fellow countrymen into uneasiness and horror as it is an inevitable product of the Park Geun Hye group's inveterate policy of submitting to the U.S.
					
					 The Park group which is committing another thrice-cursed crime before the country and the nation dare label those opposed to the THAAD deployment "traitors" and "neo-sycophants." This is like a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 The Park group is a top-class trouble-maker who has to be thrown overboard without delay.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Condemns Japanese Reactionaries' Ambition for Grabbing Tok Islets
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Condemns Japanese Reactionaries' Ambition for Grabbing Tok Islets
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government in the 2016 defense white paper reeled off sophism that Tok Islets belong to Japan. The Japanese reactionary ruling quarters have written such nonsensical phrases in the defense white paper for the last 12 years.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says Japan is sadly mistaken if it thinks it can grab other's land by this method.
					
					 Tok Islets have belonged to Korea, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It has been confirmed in various countries that Tok Islets are not "part of Japanese territory."
					
					 It is the invariable ambition of the Japanese reactionaries to stage a comeback to Asia at any cost with the U.S. backing.
					
					 The cunning Japanese reactionaries are trying hard to realize their ambition for grabbing Tok Islets, putting forward the U.S. on one hand and resorting to appeasement and deception and pressure on the south Korean puppet forces on the other. But this is a futile act.
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when the U.S. and Japanese reactionaries lorded it over on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Tok Islets are not only part of the territory of Korea but ones like the blood and soul of the Korean nation, the sovereignty of reunified Korea and part of its dignity.
					
					 The will of the Korean nation to defend the islets is just and stronger than the moves of the Japanese reactionaries to grab the islets.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' persistent call for "dominium" over Tok Islets is just like a rabid dog barking at the moon.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Demands Japan Pay for Its Thrice-cursed Crimes
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Demands Japan Pay for Its Thrice-cursed Crimes
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Whoever is Korean can never forget the monstrous crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against the Korean people in the past, inflicting incurable wounds upon them, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 Citing criminal acts committed by the Japanese imperialists against the Korean nation in the past, the article notes:
					
					 Social development of Korea was seriously retarded under the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists. Consequently, Korea had long remained a colonial semi-feudal state.
					
					 But for the Japanese imperialists' occupation of Korea, there would not have been a tragic territorial division which the Koreans have suffered till now.
					
					 It is a legal, moral and international obligation for Japan to honestly apologize for the grisly crimes committed by it against the Korean nation and properly redeem them. But Japan has not shown any sincere attitude till now, denying them. To make matters worse, it has whetted the sword for reinvasion overtly and covertly to seek revenge for the defeat it suffered in the past.
					
					 What the Japanese authorities have done in recent years, in particular, has gone beyond the tolerance limit. Their reckless acts are touching off bitterer hatred among the Koreans for Japan, the sworn enemy.
					
					 If Japan stages a comeback to Korea, the army and people of the DPRK will never miss the opportunity.
					
					 It is the unshakable will of the DPRK to force the Japanese imperialists to pay for the thrice-cursed crimes committed by them against the Korean nation down through generations.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries had better face up to the reality and think twice over their reckless moves.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Doomed to Ruin: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Doomed to Ruin: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea has busied herself in quieting down the south Korean people's anger at the decision to deploy THAAD which touched off anti-Park Geun Hye sentiment across south Korea.
					 She cunningly tried to appease the population in Songju County, saying at a meeting with the lawmakers of Taegu and North Kyongsang Province origin in Chongwadae that she would look into a suitable place other than the Songsan battery in Songju County if the county recommends another site for THAAD.
					
					 This is a shameful behavior to elicit sympathy and favor from the public to tide over the worst ruling crisis and a last-ditch effort of a viper that coiled her up at Chongwadae while employing the awful "art of self-protection" and the "worldly wisdom".
					
					 Though she, being lost to shame, plays the farce for sympathy with a miserable look on her face that got wrinkled from her thrice-cursed crimes, the plight she is finding herself being driven into a tight corner is her unavoidable fate.
					
					 She has inherited from her father, "yusin" dictator, the disposition of making no scruple to do anything if it seems to help her find a way out.
					
					 Since she became the hostess of Chongwadae, south Korea witnessed unending occurrences of grisly calamities, notably ferry Sewol disaster and MERS crisis and scandals of those in power. At those times she evaded the responsibility for them by setting out on foreign tours and employing the art of "cutting tail like lizard" and mercilessly victimized her closest aides to prolong her despicable remaining days.
					
					 Her awful intrigues and farce-play in which she adopted the stand of an "orphan" pretty well even by mentioning her parents who met deaths by violence can no longer get it anywhere.
					
					 Every serpent hath its venom. 
					
					 She again released venomous remarks that THAAD deployment is "the least, inevitable measure for defending the lives of her nationals," challenging the desire of the people and trend of the times despite the greater public protest and denunciation caused by her remarks on the re-examination of the site for the THAAD deployment.
					
					 Though she tries hard to find a way out with monster-like THAAD, the south Korean people have already booked a ticket to hell for her.
					
					 The south Korean people are crying out for the step-down of the hostess of Chongwadae as soon as possible to prevent another calamities.
					
					 Every sin brings punishment to it. 
					
					 A train is running on the track following the path taken by her father who met a miserable death, whom Park Geun Hye, the descendant of "yusin" and traitor without an equal in the world, regards as an example whenever an opportunity presents itself, no matter how desperately she may work as she is already forsaken by the people.

articles.title: S. Korean Civic and Public Organizations Meet in Seoul
articles.content:
S. Korean Civic and Public Organizations Meet in Seoul
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- South Korean civic and public organizations held a meeting in Seoul on August 13 for the successful joint conference of all political parties, organizations and individual personages in the north, south and overseas for peace and independent reunification of the Korean Peninsula, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 The chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification said when the people in the south, the north and overseas boost solidarity, the might and role of the driving force of the nation will grow stronger and the cause of independent reunification will advance.
					
					 The honorary chairman of the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy said differing political views, religions and ideologies will pose no problem in protecting the independence and right to existence of the nation and there is no reason to deny the north's proposal for the joint conference.
					
					 He called for preventing war and achieving independent reunification by making pro-active efforts for successfully holding the joint conference in the spirit of national independence and great national unity.
					
					 The head of the group for implementing the June 15 joint declaration called upon all Koreans to unite as one and struggle in order to put an end to war on the Korean peninsula, achieve durable peace, replace the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty and hold the joint conference, expressing the will to take the lead in the struggle.
					
					 A resolution was read out.
					
					 It said that it is the duty and righteous cause of all Koreans to successfully hold the joint conference which would be of epochal significance in the history of the reunification movement of the nation.
					
					 Nobody brings national reunification and all Koreans should be vanguard of reunification to bring about a new phase for independent reunification, it said.

articles.title: North-South Dialogue and Contacts Called for
articles.content:
North-South Dialogue and Contacts Called for
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration sponsored 1 000 persons-round-table talks attended by representatives from across south Korea for south-north dialogue and peace on the Korean peninsula at the Kwanghwamun Plaza in Seoul on August 14, according to Tongil News, south Korean internet newspaper.
					 Kwon O Hui, permanent representative of the Women's Headquarters of the South Side Committee, said that the Korean nation failed to gather at one place on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 Ri Chang Bok, chairman of the permanent representatives of the South Side Committee, said that the present regime's shameful act of harassing peace and infringing upon the people's right to existence is no longer tolerable.
					
					 Jo Song U, permanent representative of the south side committee, said that the main cause of the crisis on the Korean peninsula is the U.S. persistent pressure on the north.
					
					 A press release was made public.
					
					 The press release said that peace on the Korean peninsula is put at peril now that dialogue and contacts between the south and the north are suspended, adding that dialogue and contacts between the south and the north are the only way of keeping the movement for peace alive and putting an end to the pain of the nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Stages Action in Seoul in Demand of Solution to Issue of Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Stages Action in Seoul in Demand of Solution to Issue of Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea held a meeting outside the Japanese Embassy in Seoul on August 14 in demand of the settlement of the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 Victim of sexual slavery Kim Pok Dong said that Japan has not yet liquidated the crime-woven past since its defeat in the war.
					
					 She went on:
					
					 However, the Park Geun Hye regime reached the "agreement" over the issue of the sexual slavery with Japan in disregard of the struggle of civic and public organizations for the settlement of the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and Japan is claiming the withdrawal of the girl statue, talking about the "comfort money."
					
					 She blasted Park Geun Hye for working hard to reduce the Korean peninsula to battle fields by increasingly depending on outside forces and escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 A peace declaration was read out.
					
					 It said that the humiliating "agreement" with Japan without apology and reparation for the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army was unacceptable.
					
					 It reiterated the will to carry on dynamic actions until the deceptive moves of the "government" for "reconciliation and recovery foundation" are halted.

articles.title: Residents of Songju County Stage NO-THAAD Actions
articles.content:
Residents of Songju County Stage NO-THAAD Actions
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting in Songju County, North Kyongsang Province, south Korea on August 15 to denounce the puppet regime's projected THAAD deployment, according to the south Korean newspaper Hangyore.
					 Attending there were more than 5,000 inhabitants.
					
					 50,000 inhabitants of Songju County will turn out in the struggle to prevent THAAD from being deployed in any place of this land, they declared.
					
					 908 residents of Songju County had their hair cut in protest against the Park Geun Hye group of traitors trying hard to deploy THAAD for aggression at any cost.
					
					 Then they held a candlelight rally outside the Songju County Office.

articles.title: New Political Party Appears in S. Korea
articles.content:
New Political Party Appears in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The Minjung Yonhap Party aiming at independent reunification and progressive politics was formed in south Korea, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The party held an inaugural meeting in Youido, Seoul on August 14.
					
					 Speakers said the Park Geun Hye regime is moving to realize THAAD deployment in the wake of secret huddle with the U.S.
					
					 There is no way for the people to live unless the Park Geun Hye regime and the "Saenuri Party" are eliminated, they stressed.
					
					 They demanded Park Geun Hye cancel the plan for THAAD deployment and the humiliating "agreement" with Japan over the issue of sexual slavery.
					
					 They declared that they would wage candlelight demo and other actions till the plan for THAAD deployment is withdrawn.
					
					 The party in a resolution expressed the will to advance despite any ordeal, holding high the flag of democracy and independent reunification, and get united till the day of reunification.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Call for National Cooperation
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Call for National Cooperation
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean preparatory committee for August 15 national joint event held a ceremony in front of Kwanghwamun in Seoul on August 15, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 More than 300 civic and public organizations took part in the ceremony.
					
					 Speakers said urged the U.S. and Japan to make an apology for dividing the Korean peninsula.
					
					 They demanded Japan make an apology to all victims of forced drafting and immediately stop the suppression of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Now that Japan is planning for a war according to the "right to collective self-defense," they said, adding that the south Korean regime should examine the issue of retracting the humiliating "agreement" with Japan.
					
					 Stressing the need for all Koreans to pool their efforts to check Japan's rearmament for exercise of the "right to collective self-defense," they called for protecting the dignity of the nation through national cooperation.

articles.title: DPRK's Proposal Supported by Organization of Koreans in U.S.
articles.content:
DPRK's Proposal Supported by Organization of Koreans in U.S.
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. released a statement on August 15, the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The statement said that August 15, 1945 was the day when Korea was liberated from the harsh colonial rule by Japan.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The Korean nation still lives, divided into the south and the north but its desire for reunification remains unchanged.
					
					 The reunification guarantees the lives and prosperity of the Koreans.
					
					 The whole nation should be united for national reunification as all people were united in the struggle against Japanese imperialism for Korea's liberation.
					
					 The statement called on the Koreans to settle the issue of the Korea's reunification by their concerted efforts, adding that the whole nation should launch all-out actions for making the joint conference successful.

articles.title: Korea's Liberation Day Marked in Angola, Nigeria
articles.content:
Korea's Liberation Day Marked in Angola, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Meetings and film shows took place in Angola and Nigeria on August 10 and 11 to mark the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Korean films "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un" and "Mirae Scientists Street" were shown.

articles.title: Day of Songun Marked in Poland, Guinea
articles.content:
Day of Songun Marked in Poland, Guinea
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Poland and a lecture was given in Guinea on August 12 with the approach of the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership (Day of Songun).
					 On display in the venue of the meeting were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and publications introducing the DPRK.
					
					 The honorary chairman of the Tradition Association of the Polish People's Army and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into the invincible political and military power with his Songun revolutionary leadership and devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people till the last moments of his life.
					
					 Under the leadership of Kim Jong Un the Korean people resolutely smashed the aggression moves of the hostile forces and achieved great successes in the building of a socialist power true to the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force, the speakers said.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Poland.

articles.title: Korea's Liberation Day Observed by Russian Media
articles.content:
Korea's Liberation Day Observed by Russian Media
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- A Russian newspaper and internet homepage carried articles to mark the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The August issue of the newspaper Serp I Molot said in an article titled "DPRK celebrates August 15, the day of national liberation":
					
					 The Korean people's struggle against the Japanese imperialist invaders was very hard-fought.
					
					 The Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) founded by President Kim Il Sung had fought bloody battles against the Japanese imperialists, getting weapons and foodstuffs from the enemies and manufacturing weapons by its own efforts.
					
					 He established the guerilla bases in Mt. Paektu and strengthened the revolutionary ranks on the basis of them and led the cause of national liberation to victory.
					
					 The hard-fought anti-Japanese war for Korea's liberation ended with victory thanks to the talented military wisdom of the great general Kim Il Sung and absolute trust of the members of the KPRA and the Korean people in him and their ardent patriotism.
					
					 The Russian website Amur Pres posted an article titled "Korea's liberation, turning point of history" on Aug. 11, saying that Korea's liberation did not mean only the national resurrection for the Korean people but the historic event that brought about the crucial turn in their destiny from slave to master.

articles.title: Korean Socialism Is Invincible: Romanian Political Party
articles.content:
Korean Socialism Is Invincible: Romanian Political Party
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Romania posted an article titled "Why is Korean socialism invincible" on a website on Aug. 9 on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The article said:
					
					 Korean socialism is being recognized as the invincible one which can not be brought down by anything.
					
					 Where is the secret of such invincibility?
					
					 In a word, Korean socialism is the one centered on the popular masses in which they are the master of everything and everything serves them.
					
					 So it is natural that such socialism is absolutely supported by the popular masses.
					
					 Socialism centered on the popular masses was built in the DPRK thanks to the leaders who ardently loved the people and devoted their whole lives to the people.
					
					 The single-minded unity of the leader, the party and the masses, eternal vitality of Korean socialism, is based on the love of the leaders for the people.
					
					 Korean socialism to which the idea of believing in the people as in Heaven of President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, and leader Kim Jong Il, eternal head of the Workers' Party of Korea, is applied has further developed by supreme leader Kim Jong Un's politics of attaching importance to the people, respecting and loving them.
					
					 Korean socialism is invincible.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente del Congo Democratico
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente del Congo Democratico
Pyongyang, 17 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 16 al presidente de la Republica Democratica del Congo, Joseph Kabila Kabange, un mensaje de condolencias con respecto a que en la provincia de Kivu del Norte del pais africano muchos habitantes inocentes fueron asesinados por los terroristas armados. 
					Reiterando la invariable posicion de la RPDC contra todas formas del terrorismo, el remitente manifesto el apoyo y solidaridad con los esfuerzos del destinatario y gobierno amistoso del Congo Democratico por resarcir las consecuencias tragicas del incidente y lograr la paz y la seguridad del pais.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Indonesia
Pyongyang, 17 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio hoy un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Indonesia, Joko Widodo, en ocasion del 71o aniversario de la independencia de ese pais asiatico. 
					En su misiva, el remitente formulo votos por mayores exitos en los trabajos del destinatario y su pueblo por el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais, manifestando la conviccion de que se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas en el futuro las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises.

articles.title: Portavoz de cancilleria coreana advierte a EE.UU. por aumento armamentista nuclear
articles.content:
Portavoz de cancilleria coreana advierte a EE.UU. por aumento armamentista nuclear
Pyongyang, 17 de agosto (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la cancilleria de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 17 una declaracion en relacion con que la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se torna extremadamente grave debido al continuo aumento de armamentos nucleares de Estados Unidos contra la RPDC.
					El portavoz recordo que por primera vez en los ultimos 10 anos, EE.UU. ubico el dia 6 varios bombarderos estrategicos tipo B-1B y el dia 9, 3 unidades de B-2A en la base aerea Anderson de la isla Guam donde ya estan desplegados los B-52H, y prosiguio:
					
					El despliegue de esos medios estrategicos, antecedido por la entrada sucesiva en la Peninsula Coreana y sus periferias de las propiedades estrategicas de EE.UU., incluso portaaviones y submarinos nucleares, y la decision oficial sobre el emplazamiento de THAAD en el Sur de Corea, comprueba que se puso en la aventurera etapa de ejecucion el plan norteamericano de ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					Tales movimientos militares de EE.UU. no persiguen solo el ataque preventivo y sorpresivo nuclear contra la RPDC, sino forman parte del proceso de cumplimiento de la siniestra estrategia de disuadir a Rusia y China en Asia-Pacifico y mantener la hegemonia militar en esta region.
					
					La RPDC tiene la posicion invariable de eliminar de raiz el peligro de guerra nuclear, impuesto por EE.UU., y defender la paz y seguridad de la region y el resto del mundo apoyandose en su poderoso disuasivo nuclear.
					
					El ejercito y pueblo coreanos no estaran con brazos cruzados ante la amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU., que se tornan cada dia mas abiertos, y fortaleceran mas el justiciero medio nuclear para defender la soberania y la seguridad del pais.
					
					Si EE.UU. se mueve con imprudencia juzgando mal la corriente de la epoca y la posicion estrategica de la RPDC, todas sus bases militares en el teatro operacional del Oceano Pacifico, inclusive la isla Guam, seran destruidas por el ataque total y sustancial del ejercito de la RPDC.

articles.title: Portavoz del CNCDP critica cooperacion militar Sur de Corea-Japon
articles.content:
Portavoz del CNCDP critica cooperacion militar Sur de Corea-Japon
Pyongyang, 17 de agosto (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) hizo publica hoy una declaracion en relacion con que se hace cada dia mas abierta la confabulacion militar entre la banda de Park Geun-hye y los reaccionarios japoneses.
					El documento sigue abajo:
					Bajo el pretexto de discutir con los reaccionarios japoneses el denominado proyecto de "promocion de intercambio militar y amistad", los titeres surcoreanos invitan a menudo desde el ano pasado al Sur de Corea al ministro de Defensa y los cabecillas de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon. Y en varias oportunidades como la "reunion de seguridad de Asia de 2016", celebrada en junio pasado, acordaron en secreto con el pais isla ampliar el "intercambio" y la "cooperacion" en el plano militar, tales como la firma del convenio de proteccion de informaciones militares, la instalacion adicional de linea telefonica directa entre autoridades de defensa nacional, la observacion de ejercicios militares, la visita reciproca de los aviones y buques de guerra.
					
					Por consiguiente, la banda titere surcoreana permite que los buques de guerra de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon entren en los puertos surcoreanos flameando la "bandera del sol saliente esparciendo rayos", condenada como "simbolo del imperialismo japones" y "bandera criminal de guerra", y libra sin escrupulos hasta los ejercicios militares conjuntos con Japon bajo el pretexto de hacer frente a la "amenaza nuclear y de misil del Norte (de Corea)".
					
					Ademas, reanudo la entrada en el puerto de Japon de la flotilla de entrenamiento de las fuerzas navales surcoreanas, que habia sido suspendida durante 5 anos pasados por las fuertes criticas internas y externas, y expone la intencion de entregar a Japon las "informaciones referentes al misil norcoreano" con motivo de la ubicacion de THAAD en el Sur de Corea.
					
					Hasta ahora, la nacion coreana guarda el rencor de los agresores japoneses que ocuparon el territorio coreano durante casi medio siglo y lo convirtieron en un bano de sangre con asesinatos salvajes.
					
					Sin embargo, las autoridades surcoreanas permitieron a los reaccionarios japoneses celebrar publicamente en julio en la parte centrica de Seul el acto conmemorativo de la fundacion de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa", sucesoras del ejercito agresor japones, en el cual tomaron parte algunas de aquellas. Este comportamiento humillante constituye un insulto y burla intolerables para todos los coreanos.
					
					La conducta de la camarilla de Park Geun-hye, que se apela a la confabulacion militar con Japon, es imperdonable acto vendepatria y antinacional encaminado a abrirle a Japon, que dejo heridas nunca reparables a la nacion coreana, el camino de reagresion a la Peninsula Coreana y buscar otra vez los desastres de guerra.
					
					La cooperacion militar Sur de Corea-Japon, que se realiza bajo la instigacion de EE.UU., facilitara formar la alianza militar tripartita EE.UU.-Japon-Surcorea. Resulta evidente que esto traera la crisis de guerra a la Peninsula Coreana y amenazara seriamente la paz y seguridad del Nordeste Asiatico y el resto del mundo.
					
					Los compinches de Park Geun-hye intentan estrechar la cooperacion militar con los reaccionarios japoneses para enfrentarse atrevidamente con la RPDC, lo cual es un acto suicida.
					
					Todos los coreanos deberan levantarse unanimemente en la lucha pannacional por eliminar cuanto antes a la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye, fuente de desastres de la nacion, frustrar las tentativas de reagresion de los reaccionarios japoneses y defender la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana.
